0.text: Innate- Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy  champion, large  monster and 12th / 6th / 2nd (based on level) non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with  Last Rites. Only 4 graves can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest. Large monsters that die near Yorick always leave a grave.

1.text: Yorick can use  Awakening and  Mourning Mist's mark to raise a Mist Walker from each grave.

2.text: Innate - The Horde: Only 4 Mist Walkers can be active on the battlefield at a time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.

0.text: Active: Yorick curses his shovel, empowering his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancelable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and  heal him for 12 − 82 (based on level), doubled to 24 − 164 (based on level) if he is  below 50% maximum health.

1.text: If there are at least 3 graves nearby and Last Rites is active or on  cooldown, Yorick is granted the ability to cast  Awakening.

2.text: Last Rites  resets Yorick's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Yorick exhumes a Mist Walker under his command from each nearby grave.

Active: Yorick summons a wall of spirits around the target location which arises after 0.75 seconds, lasting for up to 4 seconds, acting as impassible terrain to enemies, and also granting  sight inside the ring. Enemies within the wall's perimeter at the time of its summon are  knocked aside over 0.25 seconds; within 210 units, they are pulled inside, outside this radius they are pushed away.

1.text: Dark Procession can only be targeted by enemy  champion basic attacks and  turrets. The wall takes 1 damage per attack from champions and is destroyed instantly from turret attacks.

0.text: Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to all enemies within the area, down to a minimum threshold.

1.text: Enemy  champions and  monsters hit by the Black Mist are  slowed by 30% for 2 seconds, and are marked for 4 seconds, during which they take 40% bonus damage from 8 attacks by Mist Walkers and continuously raise a Mist Walker from each nearby grave, up to a maximum of 4. Yorick, Mist Walkers and the  The Maiden gain  20% bonus movement speed when moving towards nearby marked enemies. Marked  champions are also  revealed.

2.text: Mist Walkers will  leap to nearby marked enemy champions and large monsters, dealing 100% of their AD upon arrival.

0.text: Active: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist surrounded by a number of Mist Walkers at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or Yorick dies. Eulogy of the Isles can be recast once while The Maiden of the Mist is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.

1.text: Recast: Yorick sets The Maiden of the Mist free, allowing her to push the nearest lane until she dies.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Yorick curses his shovel, empowering his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancelable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and  heal him for 12 − 82 (based on level), doubled to 24 − 164 (based on level) if he is  below 50% maximum health.

Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to all enemies within the area, down to a minimum threshold.

0.concerningText: Active: Yorick curses his shovel, empowering his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an  uncancelable windup, gain  50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and  heal him for 12 − 82 (based on level), doubled to 24 − 164 (based on level) if he is  below 50% maximum health.

Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to all enemies within the area, down to a minimum threshold.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% / 9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion, heal for ( 7.8% / 3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% / 60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% armor penetration, and 5% magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals ( 12% /  9%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage on-hit, with a minimum damage equal to 150% base AD and a maximum damage against monsters equal to 250% base AD. If the target is a champion,  heal for ( 7.8% /  3.6%) of the target's maximum health, with a minimum heal equal to ( 97.5% /  60%) base AD (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Boarding Party: While no allied champions are within 1400 units, gain 20 − 45 (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and deal 20% bonus damage against structures. Nearby allied siege minions and super minions gain 60 − 135 (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, +10% bonus size and deal 200% bonus damage against structures. Bonus resistances decay over 3 seconds while allied champions are nearby.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BOARDING PARTY: While no allied champions are within  1400 units, gain 20 − 45 (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and deal 20% bonus damage against structures. Nearby allied  siege minions and  super minions gain 60 − 135 (based on level) bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, +10% bonus size and deal 200% bonus damage against structures. Bonus resistances decay over 3 seconds while allied champions are nearby.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds.
